Articles.Content:
This is a bug/bugs I experienced during the game. I don't know what caused it but I think I have a clue. 

1. Take off normally, reach around 100k AP

2. Begin circulization late, end up dipping back into the atmosphere.

3. Get to an AP of 300k while in atmosphere, the orbital map is normal at this point.

4. Circularize at AP, check orbital map and realize that the orbital lines showing you in kerbin is gone.

5. Switch to KSC then back to your vessel to see if things normalize. 

6. Realize that your velocity is near zero and you are falling down

I think its step  4 that threw me off, this inspired me to make a X37 recreation so I should add more to this later
